description.name: Copper Pipe Cutter 3-28mm
description.long_desc:
Copper Pipe Cutter is designed for cutting copper, brass, aluminium, polyethylene and other thin-walled pipes.


Product Features



  • Cuts pipe up to 28 mm

  • Stainless steel cutting wheel

  • Built in deburring tool


Technical Data



  • Pipe Cutting Range: 3 - 28 mm
description.short_desc:

description.name: Insulating Tape Black with flame retardant type B 17mm x 0,18mm x 26m
description.long_desc:
PVC insulation tape with high dielectric strength. Suitable for insulating cable splices, harnessing and repairs.


Product Features



  • Works at Temperatures up to 80 °C

  • Suitable for indoor and outdoor use

  • Flame-retardant


Technical Data



  • Max Heat Resistant Temperature: 80 °C

  • Length: 25 m

  • Width: 17 mm

  • Tape Thickness: 0,18 mm

  • Breaking Load: 26 N.cm

  • Breakdown Voltage: 600V

  • Elongation: 150%

  • Colour: black

description.name: PTFE Sealing Tape 12mm x 0,075mm x 10m
description.long_desc:
PTFE tape is designed for gas and water pipes, binding, sealing, repairs and thread sealing.

  • Length: 10 m

  • Width: 12 mm

  • Tape Thickness: 0,075 mm

  • Colour: white

description.name: Measure Tape 3m x16 mm x 0,115mm colour GEKO
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Designed for measuring distances up to 3 m

  • ABS casing

  • Locking slide button

  • Lightweight use

  • Non-slip end hook

  • Heat-treated spring for long life


Technical Data



  • Measurement Standard: Metric

  • Special Features: Lockable

  • Blade Width: 16 mm

  • Blade Length: 3 m

  • Blade Material: Steel

  • Frame Material: ABS

  • Number of rivets: 3

description.name: Fibreglass Measuring Tape 20m GEKO Profi
description.long_desc:
Professional high tensile strength fibreglass measuring tape. It has an easy to read metric scale. The tape is presented in an impact resistant PVC plastic case with flush fitting winding handle and convenient strap handle.


Ideal for contractors, builders, electricians, carpet fitters, architects, engineers, surveyors, etc.


Product Features



  • Designed for measuring distances up to 20 m

  • PVC casing

  • water- & corrosion-proof Fibreglass blade


Technical Data



  • Measurement Standard: Metric

  • Blade Length: 20 m

  • Blade Material: Fibreglass

  • Frame Material: PVC

  • water- & corrosion-proof Fibreglass blade

description.name: Vernier Caliper with Upper Jaws 200mm 0,02mm
description.long_desc:
The Vernier Caliper is a precision instrument that can be used to measure internal and external distances accurately. The vernier caliper has a scale sliding parallel to the main scale for an additional, fractional reading to improve measurement precision.


Product Features



  • Internal & external jaws to make outside and inside dimension measurements

  • Metric scale

  • Depth measuring blade

  • Locking screw to ensure precision


Technical Data



  • Material: Stainless Steel

  • Surface Finish: Satin

  • Features: Knurled locking nut, vernier scale

  • Range: 200 mm

  • Resolution: 0.02 mm

  • Overall Length: 300 mm

description.name: Mechanical Outside Micrometer Range 0 to 1" Accurate 0,01mm
description.long_desc:
Mechanical Outside Micrometer is a practical measuring device for beginners and hobbyists. Well-suited for precise measurement of components in mechanical engineering and machining.


Product Features



  • Range 0-25 mm

  • Ratchet stop

  • Spindle lock for repetitive measurement

  • Engraved graduations on the micrometer barrel

  • Plastic case with adjusting spanner


Technical Data



  • Minimum Measurement: 0

  • Maximum Measurement: 25 mm

  • Graduations: 0,01 mm

  • Measuring Face Material: Carbide-Tipped

  • Thimble Type: Ratchet Stop

description.name: Electronic Outside Micrometer Range 0 to 1" Resolution 0,001mm
description.long_desc:
Electronic Outside Micrometer is a practical measuring device for beginners and hobbyists. Well-suited for precise measurement of components in mechanical engineering and machining.


Product Features



  • Range 0-25 mm

  • Inch/metric conversion button

  • On/Off button

  • Easy-to-read LCD display

  • Ratchet stop

  • Spindle lock for repetitive measurement

  • Plastic case with adjusting spanner


Technical Data



  • Range: 0-25 mm

  • Resolution: 0,001 mm

  • Measuring Face Material: Carbide-Tipped

  • Thimble Type: Ratchet Stop

  • Battery Type: CR2032 3.0V
